If you play pinhead, I will cast you into the river of lost souls and watch you drown with all the lost souls that you belong with. I will ensure you see the gates of hell in the desolate state you thrive in, and ensure everything in your life will wither away well before you see these said gates of hell.

Overall a pretty fun game with friends, :D I would recommend it to anyone looking to kickback and kill some time with pals. Movement system seems wonky at first but mastering it is very rewarding, learning to do things like loop is a very fulfilling learning curve. 9/10

我在玩刀30多个小时的时候给了好评。现在我翻了十倍的游戏时间。回来改差评。
想入坑的玩家看这里，对你好真的。


2020年，没啥很火的网游。大批玩家入驻steam黎明杀机身为在线前十游戏。很多萌新入坑。

但是我为什么打差评，和这群刚入坑的萌新有很大关系。以前玩steam的人少大家素质都很高。不骂人不捣乱。现在那些玩 国产网游转过来的人群继承着以前国服网友的各种骂人捣乱习性。
严重拉低了游戏玩家素质。搞臭了杀鸡的游戏环境。

试问你一个萌新没传承技能没办法自摸。老手知道，因为局势原因先抢修电机待会在治疗你。可是你怎么可以因为这点时间就在旁边反复爆点吸引屠夫呢？？？剩下两个人了一台电机不是三连电机。可以偷修。新手怕死不修也就算了，你怎么可以倒了屠夫故意扶你起来你用手指出队友的位置呢？？？最后全死了，自己当二五仔屠夫也不放过。呵呵。还有你没怀表怎么可以贴脸救人呢？而且你贴脸救人不挡刀看着屠夫杀了队友在旁边不走等屠夫二挂队友又贴脸救。大哥啊~做任务是要安全救人才算的不是拉下来就算一次的！！屠夫都看懵了告诉你。仿佛和屠夫开黑一样。

综上所述的部分关于萌新的行为进行有一说一的描述。可以说自从steam人数多起来后新来的玩家素质真的很低。出去还打fw的一大堆。可怕。要知道一款游戏，让它凉的最快的方法有两种，外挂多和玩家素质低搞臭环境。这个游戏两个都占！

现在来说外挂，红缎5段还是会匹配刀20段黄段的队友。不说这个，因为国服压根没服务器是亚服根据延迟分在一起的而已。就像糖豆人把神仙分在一起一样。同一个道理。但是，在杀鸡2020年的高分段你10把基本会遇到3把左右的屠夫有微调移速，透视装看不见。人类超快移速定位图腾等。绝对！没骗你。制作组不作为外挂一堆啊，日韩亚美四个服务器都有集中在红缎。

低端局素质低爱捣乱，高端局外挂满天飞。说实话我觉得这个游戏快凉了。环境恶臭还多挂。

我已退坑了，也希望还美入坑想买的玩家能好好看完。我说的都是真正的游戏环境，并不像主播们的直播那样好。你玩这个只会和王者荣耀一样是好心情破坏者。别入坑了。真的

I'll be completely honest and say that, initially, I hated this game. I bought it for all of the killer horror icon DLC that Steam offers. I played 3 rounds and was like..nah, this isn't for me. But, I took a break from it and re-approached it with fresh eyes and holy shit.

First off, its fun to play either side. While the Survivors are definitely under powered, it changes up the gameplay so you're not getting bored doing one thing or the other. But, the killers are definitely where its at. I was surprised to find that I enjoyed the included characters (I really just bought it for the DLC) and they were not only creepy but a lot of fun to play.

Long story short? Immersive gameplay, Replayability like whoa and all of the Horror DLC you could possibly imagine. A+

ALSO DO NOT PRESTIGE CHARACTERS YOU WILL LOSE ALL ITEMS AND OFFERINGS, ONLY PRESTIGE WHEN RUN OUT OF ITEMS, ALSO YOU GET A KOOL CLOTHING ITEM FOR DAS CHARACTER. All in all, great and fun game, cant wait for new killers

** Update **
After wasting a majority of my life playing this game out of pure anger, I must revise my previous review. First off, there will always be metas in the game (survivor and killer sided) if you wish to truly play this game and enjoy your time, DO NOT use the metas. Doing so will not make you any better, you will depend on crutch perks and tactics that will only make you worse. Experiment with builds, find perks that work well with each other, and if your playing killer try all of them. Each killer is unique, try them all out a bit, and when you find one that you like, play them. A fun thing to do is go for adepts, if you don't care about winning or losing but just learning new killers and perks, do the adept challenges. My only wish was that there was something other than an achievement for adept, like maybe a cosmetic for that character (regardless I have finished everyone adept and it honestly adds some spice to the games).

Final note: Dont be a douche. Be respectful and dont be toxic. It makes everyones experience worse. And I dont just mean in chat, like play the game to have fun, not to win. Trust me it will make you enjoy the game a lot more. 

Hope to see you guys out there.
I've had this game for years on Playstation and let me tell you... the controls on PC are so much better. One thing I do have to say is the amount of desync the killers have sometimes.

While occasionally frustrating due to the behavior of other players; both on your side and the opposing... it's a lot of fun. Whether you like being scared out of your wits when a stealthy killer grabs you by the shoulder from somewhere you didn't expect, or you want to enjoy running around in circles like an idiot with 4 other people, this game can be equal parts terrifying, campy, or frustrating. It's worth it. Trust me.

Então amigx, se tu ta lendo essa analise é porque ta com receio de comprar.
Esse jogo eu não recomendo pra nenhuma pessoa nova na área comprar, é um disperdicio de dinheiro frustante na sua vida, e com esse tanto de horas no jogo, eu vi essa "coisa" mudar... mas para PIOR né!

O jogo tem MILHÕES de coisas que o tornam ruim e estressante, mas falando apenas alguns já faz dele um completo lixo:

1- Sistema de Rank: O jogo é baseado totalmente em partidas "RANKEADAS", então é claro que vai ter sistema de Rank(Por mais que o modo de Matar seus Amigos seja totalmente ignorado no game). Mas não venha achando que essa porr* é perfeita, porque isso aí que eles chamam de Rank é só pra enfeitar mesmo, porque a porrada de jogadores que tu pega jogando no seu time acabaram de comprar a UMA hora atrás e já ta Rank 1, então se você é do tipo que gosta de uma "rapidinha" gostosa, desista.

2 - DLCs: Não preciso nem comentar que a empresa é faminta por dinheiro, afinal, só lançam DLCs com uns sobreviventes e killers apenas com roupinha diferente e poderes NÃO tão interessantes ultimamente, última vez que vi eles fazerem um killer bem original foi a Spirit e de longe, a Praga. Fora as DLCs licenciadas que tu tem que obrigatoriamente ter que pagar com aquele papelzinho que tu ganha suado, você demora uma eternidade para conseguir pelo menos 9k de fragmento pra comprar um único personagem de um pacote NÃO-LICENCIADO, e ainda + 9k pro outro personagem pra completar o pacote, e nem vem as roupas adicionais de algumas DLCs só por ter comprado da lojinha.

3- Células Aureas pra compra roupinha: Eu já disse que a empresa é faminta por dinheiro? Poisé, esse não vou nem comentar.

4- Bugs: Pras vocês, manas, que acham que o jogo é lisinho disso, relaxa, eles só esqueceram de falar que o jogo ainda ta em Early Access. Eles preferem lançar milhares de skins e DLCs "famosinhas" do que corrigir os bugs onde o killer bate na parede e te acerta até usando SpeedHack, e olha que isso é um exemplo.

5- Comunidade: Se você joga CS, ja sabe do que se trata a desse jogo, só procurar no Google o que é "Tóxico" e pronto.

6- Otimização: No fundo do poço. A cada atualização/Hotfix é menos 2 FPS pra você :3
